text:
When the Arizona Food Bank Network received a call that Taylor Swift wanted to make a hefty donation to the charity as she kicked off her Eras tour in the state, some staffers thought it was a prank.

But it was no joke.

“Barbie” has broken numerous records since its July 21 opening and the summer blockbuster is close to breaking another one.

Trailing behind “The Super Mario Bros. Movie” by an estimated $48 million, writer-director Greta Gerwig’s “Barbie” appears destined to gain the top spot for highest grossing domestic film of 2023.
Strong winds and dry conditions fueled the fires, and the island’s geography has complicated things. Have you experienced a wildfire before? Share your comments below.  ⬇️
We're hiring!

✨ 🚨 JOB ALERT - ASSISTANT EVENT MANAGER (all genders) 🚨 ✨

An alle -Superstars: Wir haben eine aufregende Gelegenheit, unser leidenschaftliches und engagiertes Team zu verstärken. Die Rolle des Assistant Event Managers ist von zentraler Bedeutung für die Planung und Durchführung sämtlicher Events, wie das Online-Format WeAreDevelopers LIVE oder den world's leading event für Developer, den WeAreDevelopers World Congress in Berlin.

Wer sind wir? 
WeAreDevelopers ist eine erfolgreiche Community, die Software-Developern dabei hilft, ihre Karriere voranzutreiben. Wir sind leidenschaftlich technologiebegeistert und engagieren uns dafür, die Jobsuche für Entwickler*innen zu revolutionieren.

Deine Rolle?
Bist du bereit, die Event-Welt auf den Kopf zu stellen? 🌪️ Wir suchen eine motivierte Person, die mit uns spannende Event-Projekte umsetzt, innovative Ideen einbringt und unsere Event-Aktivitäten für unsere Developer-Community auf ein neues Level hebt! 🚀

Als Assistant Event Manager arbeitest du Hand in Hand mit unserem Marketing- und Sales-Team zusammen. In dieser aufregenden und vielfältigen Position bist du maßgeblich für die Planung, Umsetzung und Organisation von physischen und virtuellen Events verantwortlich. Außerdem entwickelst du kontinuierlich neue Eventformate, um unsere Developer-Community weiter zu begeistern und zu inspirieren. 🚀

Hier gibt es weitere Details:

Bereit, die Event-Welt zu erobern? Bewirb dich jetzt und werde Teil unseres dynamischen Teams! 🚀

🙌🏻 🙌🏻

With incredibly talented participants, a fantastic production team, and an audience completely engaged throughout each round of the competition, CODE100 clearly exceeded our expectations! 🪩💻

, thank you for sharing how you experienced this hair-raising adventure, and congratulations on becoming, in fact, the first-ever CODE100 champion!

By the way, the first of many to come in Europe's ultimate coding competition. Are you up for the next one?
More information here 👉

Our incredible photographers had a very busy July capturing all the key moments across news and sport. But which was the best picture?

Our Head of Pictures has selected his top images for the month – and now it’s up to you to vote for the Picture of the Month! Cast your vote with a reaction!

💡 Insightful for – Just Stop Oil protester at Wimbledon 📷 Adam Davy

😂 Funny for – Rory McIlroy chips out of a bunker at The Open 📷

🧡 Love for – King Charles III and US President Joe Biden at Windsor Castle 📷 Andrew Matthews

👏 Celebrate for – England’s Stuart Broad hits a six at The Ashes 📷 Mike Egerton

🫶 Support for – Celebrations for newly-elected Liberal Democrat MP Sarah Dyke 📷

👍 Like for – Warm weather in Stratford-upon-Avon, Warwickshire. 📷

The second edition of our weekly AI Digest is published today, focusing on how ever-increasing strides in Generative Artificial Intelligence are being reported. Among the key stories are Big Tech groups frequently referencing AI alongside their latest results, and a number of news groups planning, or already using, AI-generated content. Meanwhile, an executive at US tech giant Dell insists AI represents an 'inflection point driving fundamental change’.

The dramatic rise of Artificial Intelligence is one of the biggest global stories of 2023. The technology has the potential power to transform the world, and has been described as ‘akin to the dawn on the internet’ in worldwide importance.

The key news on this transformative technology is featured in the AI Weekly Digest - a new newsletter featuring breaking stories, analysis and insights on the fast-moving sector. Included in this week's debut digest are ambitious plans by Big Tech to create a new body to regulate the industry. Analysts discussing Google owner Alphabet describe an 'AI frenzy' and US news giants meet with AI groups over testing key AI tools for journalists.

Subscribe now!
